dialogue: I need to talk to you about your apple-eating.
Every afternoon you eat an apple at your desk.
Your co-workers are complaining because it's loud.
They can't work with all of your crispy chewing noise.
In my defense, my co-workers are so incompetent that the less work they do, the better off the company is.
That is a surprisingly robust defense.
I'll come back if I can think of a counter-argument.
